title: Hindalco shares drop 6% after Novelis flags $550–650 million cash flow hit from New York plant fire
description: Hindalco Industries shares fell over 6% after its US subsidiary Novelis said a fire at its New York plant will dent FY26 free cash flow by up to $650 million and EBITDA by $150 million.
